content: Files and folders added to the room will appear here.

comment.text: Files and folders added to a room will appear here. This translation key is used as a placeholder text in an empty folder container, displayed when there are no files or folders in the room. It appears below the message "Room is empty at the moment".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ستظهر هنا الملفات والمجلدات التي تمت إضافتها إلى الغرفة' is technically correct but sounds slightly formal and verbose for this context. A more natural phrasing would be more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ستظهر هنا الملفات والمجلدات المضافة إلى الغرفة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'folders' is not explicitly translated. While 'թղթապանակները' can imply folders, a direct translation would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adding a more explicit translation of 'folders,' such as 'ֆայլերն ու պանակները' or 'ֆայլերն ու դոկումենտերը'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ໄຟລ໌' (file) is spelled correctly, but 'ໂຟນເດີ' is an older term for folder. A more modern term would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more contemporary Lao term for 'folder,' such as 'ໄຟລ໌ໂຟນເດີ' or a similar term understood by modern Lao speakers. The best term will depend on the specific context and target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the sentence structure 'ໄຟລ໌ ແລະໂຟນເດີທີ່ເພີ່ມໃສ່ຫ້ອງຈະປາກົດ ຢູ່ບ່ອນນີ້' could be improved for better flow in Lao.  The 'ຢູ່ບ່ອນນີ້' (at this place) feels slightly abrupt at the end.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the sentence to something like 'ໄຟລ໌ ແລະໂຟນເດີທີ່ເພີ່ມໃສ່ຫ້ອງຈະປາກົດຢູ່ທີ່ນີ້' (Files and folders added to the room will appear here - literally, 'will appear at this place').  Even better would be a more natural phrasing dependent on the intended tone - perhaps 'ໄຟລ໌ ແລະໂຟນເດີທີ່ເພີ່ມໃສ່ຫ້ອງຈະປະກົດຕໍ່ໄປອີ້ນີ້' (Files and folders added to the room will appear here - more conversational).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Šeit tiks parādīti telpai pievienotie faili un mapes." is a bit literal and could be improved for natural flow in Latvian. 'Telpai pievienotie' (added to the room) is slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Šeit parādīsies pievienotie faili un mapes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "aan de kamer zijn toegevoegd" (added to the room) is awkward and doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'added to the room'. It implies the files are attached to the room itself, which isn't likely what's meant. A more natural phrasing would indicate addition to a designated area or space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bestanden en mappen die aan deze ruimte zijn toegevoegd, verschijnen hier.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation "Fișierele și folderele adăugate la această sală vor fi afișate aici" is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally. 'Această sală' (this room) is not the best choice of wording. It implies a physical room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Fișierele și folderele adăugate vor apărea aici.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'bahaaluṁ' (බහාලුම්) likely refers to 'folders,' but the spelling could be slightly improved for better readability. While technically correct, it might be perceived as less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'පොට්‍රෝලි' (potroli) for 'folders' as it’s a more common and easily understood term in Sinhala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tukaj bodo prikazane datoteke in mape, dodane v sobi' is a bit literal and slightly awkward. A more natural Slovenian phrasing would be 'Datoteke in mape, dodane v sobo, se bodo prikazale tukaj.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Datoteke in mape, dodane v sobo, se bodo prikazale tukaj.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'folderi' is misspelled. It should be 'фолдери'.
